text: "Useless" is a 1997 song by Depeche Mode and is the fourth and final single from their ninth studio album Ultra. It went to number 28 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 16 in Sweden and Germany and number 17 in Finland. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Martin L. Gore. The live version of "Useless" was recorded on 10 April 1997 in London, England.
